name: ADVANCED BIOFUELS ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association formed to advance development and use of renewable energy.
sampleDescriptions: Fuels policy; tax policy for advanced biofuels; S.1068, Clean Energy for America Act; H.R. 3264, the Biodiesel, Renewable Diesel, and Alternative Fuels Extension Act of 2017; S.944, H.R. 2383, American Renewable Fuel and Job Creation Act of 2017; H.R. 1625, Targeted Rewards for the Global Eradication of Human Trafficking Act, as related to energy tax extenders; H.R. 195, Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2018, as related to energy tax extenders; H.R. 1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018, as related to energy tax extenders.

Fuels policy; tax policy for advanced biofuels; role of advanced biofuel and issues around the Renewable Fuel Standard; H.R. 1315, the RFS Reform Act of 2017; RFS program implementation including biointermediates and pathways; H.R. 5212, S.2519, GREENER Fuels Act.

Fuels policy; role of advanced biofuel and issues around the Renewable Fuel Standard, including small refinery exemptions; H.R. 1315, the RFS Reform Act of 2017; H.R. 5212, S.2519, GREENER Fuels Act.
Support mandatory funding for renewable fuels program including REAP; support National Oilheat Research Alliance (NORA) reauthorization; S.3042 & H.R. 2, Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018.
